name: Allegro Auction Grabber
author: e-Strix Kamil Mucik

sections.description:
Plug-in download auctions from auction site and can save as woocommerce product

Contributions

  • This plugin was originally developed by e-Strix Kamil Mucik.

Support

  1. Upload plug-in to wp-content/plugins
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload e-strix-allegro-symc directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the Allegro settings page
  4. Fill the form and hit save!
sections.faq:
This plugin work only with Polish Auction site

Version 1.0.1 work only with allegro.pl site, but in the future is plannig to implemented aukro.cz and aukro.ua.

Plugin can publish auction on site allegro

No, aim of plugin is download and save on woocommerce store. In the future author will create plugin with full synchronization.
sections.changelog:
2.0

  • Changed database structure
  • Changed SOAP Api to REST Api
  • Fix translation

1.1

  • Added shortcode
  • Added database version
  • Added widget
  • Fix translation

1.0

  • Possibility to import auction by Rest service with type = “sell”
  • Possibility to add auction as woocommerce product by store API
  • Added translation
